column1: 用什么相机来计算可见度
column2: What camera to use to compute visibility

column1: 用于能见度检查的自定义相机
column2: Custom camera to use for visibility check

column1: 清除对象的可见性关键帧
根据对象的情况设置集合的可见性属性。
column2: Set visibility attributes for collections based on their objects\

column1: 根据可见度选择网格面
column2: Selects mesh faces based on their visibility

column1: 为给定的网格设置面的可见性
column2: Set face visibility for given mesh

column1: 添加遮罩修改器，根据可见度隐藏网格面（仅针对网格对象）。使用网格剔除
column2: Add mask modifier to hide faces based on visibility (Mesh objects only). Uses mesh culling

column1: 在视口中应用遮罩修改器
在渲染中应用遮罩修改器
用于遮罩的顶点组名称
column2: Vertex group name to use for masking

column1: 根据对象的可见度来选择对象
column2: Selects objects based on their visibility

column1: 根据可见度为对象设置可见度属性
column2: Set visibility attributes for objects based on visibility

column1: 重置当前场景中所有对象的可见性属性。
column2: Reset visibility attributes for all objects in current scene.

column1: 设置动画帧以匹配场景设置。
column2: Set animation frames to match scene settings

column1: 设置闭塞剔除分辨率，使之与场景相匹配。
column2: Set occlusion culling resolution to match the scene\

column1: 在一个帧范围内运行操作符
column2: Run operators over a frame range

column1: 为可见性属性设置关键帧（并非所有运算符都完全支持）。
column2: Sets keyframes for visibility attributes (not fully supported by all operators)

column1: 包括可见的集合作为视图层，排除其他集合
column2: Include visible collections as view layers, excluding others

column1: 启用可见的集合作为间接的，禁用其他的
column2: Enable visible collections as indirect, disabling others

column1: 启用可见的集合作为保留，禁用其他集合
column2: Enable visible collections to be enabled as holdout, disabling others

column1: 仅使用可见顶点、边或面进行可见性测试
column2: Use only visible vertices, edges, or faces for visibility tests

column1: 只使用选定的顶点、边或面进行可见性测试。
column2: Use only selected vertices, edges, or faces for visibility tests

column1: 用来确定可见性的剔除类型
column2: Type of culling used to determine visibility

column1: 添加到视图框中的边距（相机框中最长边的百分比）
column2: Margin added to the view frustum (percentage of longest side of camera frame)

column1: 从摄像机到物体的最大允许距离
column2: Maximum allowed distance from camera to object

column1: 横跨摄像机视图的射线行数
column2: Number of rows of rays spanning the camera view

column1: 跨越摄像机视野的射线列数
column2: Number of columns of rays spanning the camera view

column1: 添加反弹以寻找反射中可见的物体
column2: Add bounces to find objects visible in reflections

column1: 击中后反弹的最大射线数
column2: Maximum number of rays to bounce from hits

column1: 反弹所经过的最短距离，被认为是击中。
column2: The shortest distance travelled for bounce to be considered a hit

column1: 弹跳射线的最远飞行距离
column2: The farthest distance a bounce ray will travel

column1: 使用当前可见的物体进行可见性检查
column2: Use currently visible objects for visibility checks

column1: 使用当前选择的对象进行可见性检查
column2: Use current selection for visibility checks

column1: 排除被其他对象所包围的集合中的对象
column2: Exclude objects that are in collections instanced by other objects

column1: 启用可见的对象为可选择的，禁用其他对象
column2: Enable visible objects to be selectable, disabling others

column1: 暂时启用视窗中的可见对象，隐藏其他对象
column2: Enable visible objects temporarily in viewport, hiding others

column1: 在视窗中全面启用可见对象，禁用其他对象
column2: Enable visible objects globally in viewport, disabling others

column1: 启用渲染中的可见对象，禁用其他对象
column2: Enable visible objects in render, disabling others

column1: 保留现有的选择并添加新的选择
column2: Preserve existing selection and append new selection

column1: 选择摄像机视角外的物体，而不是视角内的物体。
column2: Select objects outside the camera view instead of in view
